title: My Roommate Seems to Like Me - Novel Updates
tags: Calm Protagonist   Clingy Lover   Cold Love Interests   College/University   Love at First Sight   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day
author: 废白
description:
Jiang Zhong originally thought he and Xi Qin were just roommates, not even friends. However, he suddenly discovered that this cold, quiet roommate remembered his likes and dislikes and took special care of him…

…

Web search:

“What should I do if my roommate is too considerate?”

“What should I do if I like my roommate?”

“Confession to your roommate?”

“What do I need to pay attention to when interacting with roommates?”>
